Class Baraja

java.lang.Object
CLASES.Baraja
public class Baraja extends Object
The Baraja class represents a deck of cards used in the game. It contains methods to shuffle the deck, draw cards, and manage the deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Baraja(ArrayList<CartaSuerte> baraja)
    Default constructor that initializes the deck with an empty list.

      baraja - the new deck of cards to replace the current one

    • robarCarta

      public CartaSuerte robarCarta()
      Returns and removes the first card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the first CartaSuerte object from the deck
